title: Waters of life
creator_credit: Greenpark Productions and Central Office of Information
brief_description: The advantages of the Colombo Plan to the people of Ceylon. Shows how the old way of living, with its drought, disease and lack of agriculture has been changed by the new schemes providing for controlled irrigation, clearing of land, and resettling of villages. Adapted from the Ceylon Government Film “New Horizons”.
